Package com.paiondata.aristotle.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/user") @Validated public class UserController extends Object
Controller for handling user-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("/{oidcid}") public Result<UserVO> getUser(@PathVariable @NotBlank(message="oidcid must not be blank!") @NotBlank(message="oidcid must not be blank!") String oidcid)
      Retrieves a user and its graphs by OIDC ID.

      This method handles a GET request to retrieve a user and its associated graphs based on the provided OIDC ID. It validates the OIDC ID and calls the user service to fetch the user data. The result is wrapped in a Result object and returned.

      Parameters:
      oidcid - the OIDC ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      a Result object containing the user data as a UserVO

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public Result<List<UserVO>> getAll()
      Retrieves all users and their graphs.

      This method handles a GET request to retrieve a list of all users and their associated graphs. It calls the user service to fetch the user data. The result is wrapped in a Result object and returned.

      Returns:
      a Result object containing a list of all users as UserVO

    • createUser

      @PostMapping public Result<UserDTO> createUser(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserDTO userDTO)
      Creates a new user.

      This method handles a POST request to create a new user based on the provided user DTO. It validates the input DTO and calls the user service to perform the creation. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message and the created user data.

      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO containing the user information to create
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message and the created user data as UserDTO

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping public Result<String> updateUser(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserDTO userDTO)
      Updates an existing user.

      This method handles a PUT request to update an existing user based on the provided user DTO. It validates the input DTO and calls the user service to perform the update. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO containing the updated user information
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping public Result<String> deleteUser(@RequestBody @NotEmpty(message="oidcids must not be empty!") @NotEmpty(message="oidcids must not be empty!") List<String> oidcids)
      Deletes users by their OIDC IDs.

      This method handles a DELETE request to delete users based on the provided list of OIDC IDs. It validates the input list and calls the user service to perform the deletion. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      oidcids - the list of OIDC IDs of the users to delete
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message
